name: texturally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to how something feels by touch: The chicken had a lot of flavour, but texturally it was greasy and not pleasant to eat. The upholstery was made from a texturally rough fabric that scratched the backs of my legs.
in a way that relates to the character or style of a piece of writing or music: The band's sound has evolved texturally since they came on the scene ten years ago. The style of the illustrations meshes well with the sparse but texturally rich writing.
More examplesFewer examplesThe jacket was made of a fabric that texturally resembled leather.There are a couple of songs on the record that have simple harmonies, played with two or three chords, but that are texturally complex.
